NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_runningnormal_00
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: We there yet? Who has the map? Do we have a map? Hello?

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_dropkillnormal_01

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_00
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN - Proofread: Aw, come on. Who's doing that?
Simplified Chinese: 噢，别闹了，谁在那狂点我？

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_03
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: That's it! Putting you on my list.
EN - Proofread: That's it! Putting you on my list.
Simplified Chinese: 我受够了！我要把你放到暗杀名单里

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_04
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: Better lock your doors. Board your windows.
EN - Proofread: Better lock your doors. Board your windows.
Simplified Chinese: 劝你把家门关好，窗子封上

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_05
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: Think I'll take a finger for this. Or two.
EN - Proofread: Think I'll take a finger for this. Or two.
Simplified Chinese: 我得去收你一两根指头

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_06
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: Maybe put poison in your soup. Spikes in your mattress.
EN - Proofread: Maybe put poison in your soup. Spikes in your mattress.
Simplified Chinese: 或者在你汤里下毒，床垫上放钉子

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_07
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: Maybe I'm waiting for you already, there, outside of your room.
EN - Proofread: Maybe I'm waiting for you already—there, outside your room.
Simplified Chinese: 说不定我已经在等着你了，对，就在你房门外

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_08
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: Maybe I'm behind you right now! Better not turn around!
EN - Proofread: Maybe I'm behind you right now! Better not turn around!
Simplified Chinese: 说不定我现在就站在你后面！劝你不要转身！

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_09
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: Point is, you won't see me coming if you don't STOP–IT–RIGHT–NOW!
EN - Proofread: Point is, you won't see me coming if you don't STOP–IT–RIGHT–NOW!
Simplified Chinese: 总之，我会让你死得不明不白，除非你-立-刻-住-手！

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_12
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: I chose the lesser of two evils.
EN - Proofread: I chose the lesser of two evils.

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_13
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: This is Snake. Colonel, can you hear me?
EN - Proofread: This is Snake. Colonel, can you hear me?

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_15
SPEAKER: Ninja
EN: A name means nothing on the battlefield.
EN - Proofread: A name means nothing on the battlefield.

NAME: vo_ply_ply_nin_joke_char_select_normal_16

EN: I'm no hero. Never was, never will be.
EN - Proofread: I'm no hero. Never was, never will be.

EN: Why do game characters all sound the same?
